name: Rose and Locket
storyline:
Quitting the life of a gunslinger, Rose swore to never again take up arms after her daughter was born. The peace of a loving family was quickly tarnished, as malevolent forces trapped the child’s spirit inside a silver Locket.

To save her daughter’s spirit, Rose will journey through the realms of the Underwest. Along her path, she’ll recover long-forgotten skills and abilities, wield awesome powers, and face countless foes.
summary: Rose, a retired outlaw, wanders through the spirit realm of the Underwest. Take up the once-forgotten skills of the gunslinger, and journey along the breathtaking, cinematic hand-painted landscapes on a quest to rescue your daughter’s spirit.
